ARABIC: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, This is nothing but magic from the past.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And said: "This is nothing but the magic of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and said: “This (Qur'an) is merely a sorcery of yore;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: said, "This (the Quran) is nothing but magic, inherited from ancient magicians.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And said, “This is nothing but magic learnt from earlier men.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he said: "This is nothing but magic from that of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: ~Then he said: This is naught but enchantment, narrated (from others);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'This is naught but a trumped-up sorcery;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And said: This is naught else than magic from of old;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and said, "This is nothing but sorcery from the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he said: naught is this but magic from of old;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: saying, ‘It is nothing but traditional sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he said: "This is nothing but magic from that of old;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and said: 'This is no more than traced sorcery;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And said, “This is nothing but magic from the past.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:24] and said, of what he [the Prophet] had brought: ‘This is nothing but handed-down sorcery, learnt from sorcerers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And said: This) which Muhammad (pbuh) says (is naught else than magic from of old) magic which he took from Musaylimah the liar in al-Yamamah and he is now relating it to us; it is also said that this means: what he says is taken from Jabr and Yasar;
